properties.entry: SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#seletAllNovel() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelDetail() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.DAY_OF_WEEK FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
SELECT CHAPTER_NUM , WEB_NOV_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_DETAIL WHERE WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
